title: Vicious Art - Discography
description:
Here to bring you some more awesome Death Metal.

Vicious Art is an assembly of some old time death metal guys.  Needless to say, they&#039;re fucking awesome.  I wouldn&#039;t be uploading them if they weren&#039;t worth listening to.  They&#039;re sound changes between the two albums, but either way, they sound fan-fucking-tastic.

Vicious Art


Fire Falls and the Waiting Water - (2004)

1. Debria Seems to be Bleeding
2. Komodo Lights
3. Fire Falls
4. A Whistler and His Gun
5. Ceremony (The Waiting Waters)
6. Mother Dying
7. The Poet Must Die
8. Cut This Heathen Free
9. War
10.Why Would the Captured Set Free...


Pick Up This Sick Child - (2007)

1. Tombstone Grind
2. The Paulina Paw Paintings
3. Our Family Flesh
4. Murderer
5. We&#039;re Both Into Killing Me
6. Chewing Gunpowder
7. Evicting Dead Tenants
8. Dancing Munchhausen
9. And Bent Down For Years
10.Chain Hooks Falling
11.The Topmost Violent God

if you like brutal death metal... just download and seed.
